alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:58PM CDT until May 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND CENTRAL ADAIR COUNTIES... At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Adair State Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Westville... Adair State Park... Christie... Baron... Maryetta... Odell... Morrow... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
